issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
These commands should be equivalent:

{{ti sdk install latest}}

{{ti sdk install -b latest}} (or {{ti sdk install --branch latest}})

In my tests, however 

{{ti sdk install latest}} installs 3.5.0.GA

{{ti sdk install -b latest}} installs 3.4.2.v20141125154126
fields.summary: CLI: ti sdk install -b latest installs different version than ti sdk install latest

comments.body:
I am able to reproduce this issue. 
*ti sdk install latest* installs 4.0.0 GA
*ti sdk install -b latest* installs 6.2.0.v20170626084207

This was my environment;
Ti SDK 6.1.1.v20170623141152
Appc NPM 4.2.9
Appc CLI 6.2.1
Ti CLI 5.0.13
Alloy 1.9.11
Arrow 2.0.0
Xcode 8.2 (8C38)
Node v4.8.2
Java 1.8.0_131
